// Pivot 0, 0
int FlipRight[18] = {
	5, 13,
	55, 7,
	62, 12,
	64, 19,
	63, 25,
	57, 30,
	6, 28,
	1, 24,
	2, 17
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float FlipRight[18] = {
	0.076923f, 0.351351f,
	0.846154f, 0.189189f,
	0.953846f, 0.324324f,
